Goa Police on Saturday arrested two more persons in connection with the murder.

articles.title: PM Modi Inaugurates Bhuj Earthquake Memorial
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday inaugurated Smriti Van memorial, which celebrates the resilience shown by people during the devastating 2001 earthquake in the Kutch region of Gujarat.
articles.content:
The Smriti Van memorial has been built over nearly 470 acres.
